name: FigJam Connectors in Figma
description:
Copy connectors to your pages and connect them to the edge of frames or shapes, they work like FigJam, when you move the anchors they snap to the edge of objects.


You can:

  • Double click on the connector to add text, (but it initiates with your current font setting, so I put connector with texts too).
  • Change the path of the connectors.
  • Hold shift when moving the anchors of a connector to change line shape to solid instead of curved.
  • Change the styles of the connectors (color, stroke width, stroke dashes)
  • Move text along with the connector

You can't:

  • Connect the Connectors to instances sublayers.
  • Group connectors


Also, you can copy connectors or shapes from FigJam to Figma instead of using this file.
